scripts.build:android: npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.build:android:win: npx cap sync android && cd android && gradlew.bat assembleRelease
scripts.build:android:debug: npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.build:android:debug:win: npx cap sync android && cd android && gradlew.bat assembleDebug
scripts.clean:win: if exist android\app\build rmdir /s /q android\app\build && if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist
